name: ManorRush
description:
Play as a scarecrow defending the chocolate manor from horde of zombies with low blood sugar. Defend wave after wave as they try to eat all of it, and try not to get eaten yourself.

The game was made in two weeks as a small third person prototype for Halloween.

Features:

  • Shoot zombies
  • Shoot bottles
  • Do not die

Controls
Move the character with WASD
Shoot with left mouse button/ Aim with right mouse button
Reload gun with R
